page.title: 17SUPERNATURAL
page.content: Devon is a very old county with many ancient villages and towns. Many villages have haunted houses. In Stokeinteignhead, Rock Cottage, Higher Farm and Gabwell Farm are reputed to be haunted. The Combe Cellers Inn at Combeinteignhead is also said to be haunted. At 12noon at Rock Cottage banging noises are heard on the stairs but no one is ever there. In a room at the Combe Cellers Inn there is a distinctive smell of roses even when there are no roses anywhere near the room. Many local people are superstitious. We conducted our own survey among local people and the results are on the next page.
